name: Phu Hung 1 Hotel Noi Bai
address: Dien Xa, Soc Son, Noi Bai Airport, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in the lovely area of Noi Bai Airport, Phu Hung 1 Hotel Noi Bai enjoys a commanding position in the culture, business hub of Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Take advantage of a wealth of unrivaled services and amenities at this Hanoi hotel. A selection of top-class facilities such as free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room, laundry service can be enjoyed at the hotel.

The hotel features 8 beautifully appointed guest rooms, many of which include television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, mini bar, telephone, fan. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your reason for visiting Hanoi, the Phu Hung 1 Hotel Noi Bai is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away.
